title: Controlled Access Entry*, Linen Closet
map_address: 2251 South Fort Apache Road near Sarah &Fort Apache
posting_body: ['Luxurious West Las Vegas Apartments Available', 'Talavera’s modern apartments are designed and outfitted for a fulfilling Spring Valley lifestyle, with each pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom spacious home interior finished to create a contemporary aesthetic.', 'Our community features include a comfortable resident lounge, a billiards room, resort-style pool/spa areas, and onsite conveniences all overseen by an attentive onsite management team.', 'Call for additional amenity and leasing details or to book your personal tour.', 'RENOS - COMING SOON!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 42', 'OR Text', '42', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1130 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Air Conditioning & Central Heat', '- Private Decks with Enclosed Storage', '- WiFi ready', '- Wired for Technology', '- Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floor Homes', '- Linen Closet', '- Full-Size Washer and Dryer', '- Spacious Pantries', '- Wood Plank Flooring Throughout Unit*', '- Available Garages with Remote Access', '- Expansive Nine-Foot Ceilings', '- Inviting Gas Log Fireplaces*', '- Walk-in Closets', '- New LED Lighting Package', '- Stainless Steel Appliances Package*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Newly Modernized Resort-Inspired Pools and Spas', '- On-Site Management and Maintenance', '- Controlled Access Entry*', '- Green Globe Certified', '- Convenient Access to Abundant Shopping, Neighborhood Amenities and Schools', '- Newly Renovated Fitness Center Open 24/7', '- We Love Pets!*', '- Automated Package Locker System', '- Resident WIFI Lounge', '- Barbecue Grills and Picnic Areas Throughout', '- Near Highway US95 and 215', '- Smoke Free Community*', '- Assigned Parking', '- Deposit Alternative Options Available', '- Direct Private Access to green belt', '- Easy Access to the Strip and Major Employment Venues', '- Resident Lounge/Game area', '*Restrictions Apply.', 'See Sales Associate For Details.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'One-time pet fee: $400', 'Pet monthly rent min: $35 (per pet)', 'Pet policy: Breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 8:00AM-5:00PM', 'Talavera', '2251 South Fort Apache Road, Las Vegas, NV, 89117', 'VhZbFqiBY4Q']
